en.hero_title: AI-powered Digital Health Record Platform for Migrant Workers in Kerala
en.hero_subtitle: Ensure secure and accessible health records for migrant workers
en.feature_records_desc: Securely store and manage digital health records with AI-powered insights.
en.feature_hospitals_desc: Find nearby hospitals and healthcare facilities with real-time availability.
en.feature_emergency_desc: Quick access to emergency services and critical health information.
en.login_subtitle: Log in to your CuraVie account
en.signup_subtitle: Join CuraVie to manage your health records
en.dashboard_no_details: You have not filled out your worker details yet. Please create your profile to access all features.
en.worker_details_subtitle: Please fill out your occupational and lifestyle details.
en.health_record_subtitle: Enter your latest health vitals below.
en.placeholder_any_chronic_disease: Enter details of chronic disease (if any)
en.worker_details_subtitle_alt: This information helps us provide accurate health recommendations.
en.add_visit_subtitle: Record details of a recent visit to a healthcare facility.
en.placeholder_diagnosis: Enter diagnosis, symptoms, and prescription details...
en.dashboard_ai_report_coming_soon: Your personalized AI health risk report and recommendations will appear here once you have added sufficient health data.
en.healthcare_details_subtitle: Please fill out your Healthcare Facility details.
en.log_activity_subtitle: Keep track of your physical activities to see your progress.
